title: Skeleton hero

Monster ID1537

The skeleton hero can be found in the Ancient Cavern, which to access the player must have completed Barbarian training. The hero can appear when a player rummages a skeleton lying on the ground and, after rising, will attack the player.

Contents

  • 1 Habitat
  • 2 Drops
